title: Ticket #891: condor_startd segmentation fault on shutdown when deleting slots

Steps to Reproduce:
1. use the same configuration of BZ526847
2. submit the same test and leave condor running for one hour
3. service condor stop

startd crashes; MasterLog says:
10/28 22:26:26 The STARTD (pid 14603) died due to signal 11 (Segmentation
fault)
